name: Product Tile
description: Image, text overlay, 'Shop Now' control that links user to a product detail page; Image is defined by the selected product

attribute_definition_groups.name: Product Specifications
attribute_definition_groups.description: Specify the product to be displayed from this product tile.

attribute_definitions.name: Product
attribute_definitions.description: Select the product SKU to be displayed.

attribute_definitions.name: Product Name
attribute_definitions.description: The text overlay to be displayed. If nothing is entered the product name will be displayed.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Button Specification
attribute_definition_groups.description: Specify the link for the 'Show Now' button.

attribute_definitions.name: Link
attribute_definitions.description: Optional specification for the link to where the user will be directed. If nothing is specified, the link to product SKU selected will be used.
